item.description:
Come out to the Bocoup Loft and see Rick Waldron talk about ECMAScript 6, AKA the future version of JavaScript. In addition to working at Bocoup and being part of the jQuery team, Rick is also a member of TC-39 -- the committee that standardizes JavaScript.

Rick will be discussing the exciting features coming down the pipeline in the next version of JavaScript. So if you love JavaScript (and we know you do) and you want to be prepared for the future, you don't want to miss this talk!

(We're also looking for pizza/beer/soda sponsors, which runs about $500. Just write to the event organizer if you're interested!)
item.name: Rick Waldron on the Future of JavaScript
